mapper.select: SELECT b.* ,a.HandoverStatus FROM oms_operator_handover a INNER JOIN oms_operator_handover_subform b ON a.ID=b.HandoverFormID AND a.OperatorId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into oms_operator_handover (ID, OperatorId, HandoverId, HandoverTime, HandoverStatus) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handovertime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{handoverstatus,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into oms_operator_handover
ID,
OperatorId,
HandoverId,
HandoverTime,
HandoverStatus,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handovertime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{handoverstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update oms_operator_handover
OperatorId = #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HandoverId = #{handoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HandoverTime = #{handovertime,jdbcType=DATE},
HandoverStatus = #{handoverstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
